subject: URGENT: Q4 Report Review Needed
body: Hi, I need your feedback on the Q4 report by end of day. Please review the attached and send me your comments ASAP. This is blocking the board presentation.

body: Thanks for the update. Can we schedule a call this week to discuss the revised timeline? Let me know your availability.
